name: Enchanted Mango
description: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

abilities.name: Eat Mango
abilities.description: Consumes the mango and instantly mana restores.
notes: Self-mana restores upon activation, even while the wielder is invulnerable
Requires Ctrl to target an allied hero
Considers clones, illusions, and creep-heroes as heroes
Neither requires turning nor facing the targeted unit to cast, as long it is within the cast range
Can be cast on untargetable units indirectly via portrait-casting
Enchanted Mangoes on the ground have a greater pick-up range compared to other items

additionalInfo: The health regeneration bonus from multiple instances fully stacks
Enchanted Mangoes dug up with Trusty Shovel are fully shareable, but cannot be sold
trivia: Enchanted Mango's description is a reference to an old Weibo post by Icefrog, in which he mentioned that he loves mangoes
It is believed that the item idea came from a Reddit thread where someone suggested a Tango that restores mana â€” and a user jokingly suggested that the item be named Mango
Prior to the July 14, 2017 Patch, Enchanted Mango's active ability, Eat Mango, did not have an official name. The name was taken from the Dota 2 Wiki and officially implemented into Dota 2

recentChanges.description: Reduced initial stock from Infinite to 4. Reduced max stock from Infinite to 4. Increased restock time from 0 to 120.
Reduced health regeneration bonus from 0.6 to 0.4.
Reduced gold cost from 70 to 65. Eat Mango no longer has a 250 cast range buffer.
